name: Serious Fishing
description:
A short atmospheric game about Fishing.

Features:

Highly accurate fishing simulation
Rope physics
Atmospheric weather with lightnings
A boat !
Secrets !

Uncover the dark secrets of the lake!
Don't fall into water!
Fish!

Controls:

WASD - Move
Left Shift - Run
Left Mouse - Throw
Right Mouse - Rewind
Space - Jump
Tab - Set Loose Caught Fish
E - Drop / Pick Up Items

Made for #FishingJam2!
